Summary: cylinder crossed my line of sight moving east to west, pacing commercial aircraft.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Maryville
There were no other sightings in Maryville on or around March 22nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 11:21 AM I walked into the front yard and my attention was directed to a DC10 (engines on rear of aircraft) that was very low and probably just taken off from Knoxville airport. This aircraft was headed east. Far above it were two objects. One was clearly a commercial aircraft, leaving contrails and I could clearly see the wings. A few thousand feet below that, not leaving any contrail, was another object, cylinderical in shape, with no visible wings. The lower object (from my point of view) paced the commercial aircraft. I watch both until the cylinderical object was no long visible and the commerical aircraft was just a point of light. Cylinderical object was the size of a cigarette butt held at arms lenght. Commercial aircraft was about half that size. It made no turns at all. I kept wishing it would do something goofy but it continued pacing the commercial aircraft until out of sight.
